channel.title: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Failed to get 4 hanging out allies"

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: I noticed after posting that (I'm making a run with another character), so I used J-Diddy, working pairwise, and used a few hairpin pieces. If it doesn't work this time around, I'll take a few days for setup next time … probably choose 4 allies, take them close to what's needed, but be careful not to go over, and go all-out with the extra 100 stamina as well…

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: Not all villages have the HoClaus as a trainer at this time, so not everyone can use the Ninja-mas spirit.

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: I just went with J-Diddy and the Ninja-mas Spirit jutsu to work on friend points for 2 at a time, myself … buy it from a trainer if you need to, it's cheap enough to use, and take a day or two to set up your friend levels for the attempt.

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: hmm 2500 rep points for a make out mood enchancer…i was gona get the arena favorite but i might rethink that now

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: If you have a lot of Arena points you can get a Make-out Mood Enhancer that way as well.

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: guess ill just do it the other way -.- get four allies to like 8k friend points and then spend a day partying with each of them two at a time -.-

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: Well a few allies have 7000 points. Should be easy to use Tic Tac and J-Diddy

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: It's impossible to hang out with someone after you've activated the theme. Their friend points start at zero on that day. The only way to use Floating on Air to get Nadeshiko is to combine it with a Make-Out Mood Enhancer.

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: So basically You had to become friends with Mister Six AFTER you activated the theme.

item.title: Re: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded:
"If you use this theme, you can't hang out with other allies via friend points, because you lose all of them."

One of the notes listed on the page Floating On Air.

item.title: Failed to get 4 hanging out allies
item.content:encoded: So yesterday I had 13,000 friend points with Mister Six before I went to bed. I switched my team out with Billy, Anon, and Right. (killing a special mission off by doing this). and activated my floating on air theme. I woke up to my surprise to find that i was only hanging out with Billy, anon and right and no mister six -,-. Am i doing something wrong? or did they change the Floating on Air theme?
